contributing/chapter-authoring.title: Chapter Authoring Guide
contributing/chapter-authoring.description: This guide provides comprehensive instructions for authoring new chapters for the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook.

github-pages-deployment-research.title: GitHub Pages Deployment with GitHub Actions for Docusaurus

intro.title: Introduction to Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
intro.description: Learn the fundamentals of modern robotics including ROS 2, Isaac Sim, and AI integration

module-1-ros2-fundamentals/chapter-1-nod.title: Chapter 1: ROS 2 Nodes & Lifecycle
module-1-ros2-fundamentals/chapter-1-nod.description: Learn how to create ROS 2 nodes, understand node lifecycle states, and implement lifecycle callbacks for robust robotics applications

module-1-ros2-fundamentals/chapter-1-pub.title: Chapter 1: ROS 2 Publishers and Subscribers
module-1-ros2-fundamentals/chapter-1-pub.description: Learn the fundamental communication pattern in ROS 2 - publishers and subscribers

module-1-ros2-fundamentals/chapter-2-top.title: Chapter 2: ROS 2 Topics & Services
module-1-ros2-fundamentals/chapter-2-top.description: Master ROS 2 communication patterns including publish-subscribe for data streams and request-response for service calls

module-1-ros2-fundamentals/chapter-3-par.title: Chapter 3: ROS 2 Parameters & Launch
module-1-ros2-fundamentals/chapter-3-par.description: Learn to configure ROS 2 nodes using parameters, manage parameter lifecycles, and orchestrate multi-node systems with launch files

module-2-isaac-sim/chapter-1-introductio.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Isaac Sim
module-2-isaac-sim/chapter-1-introductio.description: Get started with NVIDIA Isaac Sim for robotics simulation

module-2-isaac-sim/chapter-1-introductio.title: Chapter 4: Isaac Sim Environment Setup
module-2-isaac-sim/chapter-1-introductio.description: Learn to install, configure, and navigate NVIDIA Isaac Sim for robotics simulation, including ROS 2 bridge setup and basic scene creation

module-2-isaac-sim/chapter-2-urdf.title: Chapter 2: Robot Models & URDF
module-2-isaac-sim/chapter-2-urdf.description: Learn how to create and use Unified Robot Description Format (URDF) files to define robot models for simulation in Isaac Sim

module-2-isaac-sim/chapter-3-sensors.title: Chapter 3: Sensors & Physics Simulation
module-2-isaac-sim/chapter-3-sensors.description: Learn how to configure and use various sensors in Isaac Sim, understand physics simulation parameters, and create realistic sensor data

module-3-applications/chapter-1-kinemati.title: Chapter 1: Robot Kinematics
module-3-applications/chapter-1-kinemati.description: Learn forward and inverse kinematics for robotic manipulators, including mathematical foundations and practical implementations

module-3-applications/chapter-2-navigati.title: Chapter 2: Navigation & Path Planning
module-3-applications/chapter-2-navigati.description: Learn navigation stacks, path planning algorithms, and obstacle avoidance for autonomous mobile robots

module-3-applications/chapter-3-percepti.title: Chapter 3: Perception & Sensor Fusion
module-3-applications/chapter-3-percepti.description: Learn perception algorithms and sensor fusion techniques for autonomous robots, including object detection, tracking, and state estimation

module-3-applications/chapter-4-humanoid.title: Chapter 4: Humanoid Robot Control
module-3-applications/chapter-4-humanoid.description: Learn humanoid robot control including bipedal locomotion, balance control, and whole-body motion planning
